content.raw:
Sweeeeet.

* You can delete the `AndorSolis/runviewer_parsers.py` file - if there is no runviewer parser then you don’t need to define one.
* You can delete the contents of `__init__.py`. This is where you would do version checks, but you don’t have any particular verison requirements, so you can just leave `__init__.py` blank, with no copyright header either.

Copyright headers should say “Monash University and contributors”. Apologies for misleading copyright headers elsewhere. The situation is that Monash has copyright over the labscript suite as it was in 2013, and contributors since then retain copyright over anything they contribute \(and some people automatically assign copyright to their employer by virtue of their employment contract, others don’t\).
content.html:
Sweeeeet.

  • You can delete the AndorSolis/runviewer_parsers.py file - if there is no runviewer parser then you don’t need to define one.
  • You can delete the contents of __init__.py. This is where you would do version checks, but you don’t have any particular verison requirements, so you can just leave __init__.py blank, with no copyright header either.

Copyright headers should say “Monash University and contributors”. Apologies for misleading copyright headers elsewhere. The situation is that Monash has copyright over the labscript suite as it was in 2013, and contributors since then retain copyright over anything they contribute (and some people automatically assign copyright to their employer by virtue of their employment contract, others don’t).
